name: Penny's Pasture
description:
Made for the 8 Bits to Infinity Challenge #1, in which we had to make a game using only free assets in 4 hours or less.  And then submitted to Rigid Jam 4, which had the same time constraint and a theme of "On the Run" which seems like a close-enough description of Penny.  :)

Assets used:

  • Graphics: "Isometric Assets - Lite" by Jaqmarti
  • Music: "Contemplative Breaks" by Joshua McLean
